title: Big Announcement
description:
A new era has dawned for Hello from the Magic Tavern. Usidore, Chunt, and Arnie are doing their own thing again. The podcast is now an independent production. YOU can support the show directly and receive bonus episodes and rewards by joining our Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/magictavern for only $5 per month. The hosts are here to give you all the details and announce when to expect new episodes for Season Four! You can always follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and now Patreon!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
